content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

"""
I attempted multiple shell commands to activate the arcgis environment, but all failed due to missing files. However, my latest attempt involved executing two shell commands to activate the environment and check the arcgis version, which were successful. Additionally, I received two AI responses with shell commands to execute and check the arcgis version, both of which were successful. My latest actions involved executing the shell commands provided by the AI responses to check the arcgis version.
"""

"""
